news.title: Man admits causing death of niece in crash weeks after she gave birth
news.summary: A man pleaded guilty before a court today to dangerous driving causing the death of his niece and to producing a machete on the same day.

news.title: Election fraudster works for Healy-Rae family firm, Minister told
news.summary: A senator has called for an investigation after he claimed a man who pleaded guilty to electoral fraud works for a company run by the Healy-Rae dynasty.

news.title: Man admits to unlawful killing of pensioner Tom Niland (73) five days into trial
news.summary: Five days into his trial for the unlawful killing of 73-year-old Tom Niland, who was beaten by three men and left to die in the rural home where he lived alone, John Irving this morning changed his plea to guilty.

news.title: Senior council official who called for boycott of holiday homes told to switch off his phone to avoid commenting on controversy
news.summary: The senior council official who called for a boycott of holiday-home owners was told to switch off his phone after defying several instructions to stop commenting on the controversy, internal records have revealed.

news.title: Ben Healy loses yellow jersey in searing heat as Tadej Pogacar makes huge statement in Pyrenees
news.summary: Ireland’s Ben Healy lost his yellow jersey of overall leader at the Tour de France today after a torturous day in the blistering heat of the French Pyrenees.

news.title: Boy (4) suffered fatal brain damage after choking on cocktail sausage, inquest hears
news.summary: A young Limerick boy suffered fatal brain damage after choking on a cocktail sausage at his home three years ago, an inquest has heard.

news.title: ‘My boy could 100pc travel for spinal surgery but we have never been offered the choice’, says mum of teen left on waiting list once again
news.summary: In November 2017, Crumlin Children’s Hospital apologised to Darragh Cahill, at the time a seven-year-old boy who had waited 15 months for surgery to correct a curve in his spine.

news.title: The Open: Rory McIlroy moving along nicely as Shane Lowry signs off with a 70 at Royal Portrush
news.summary: It’s a massive week in Royal Portrush as the 153rd Open Championship takes place.

news.title: Eilis O’Hanlon: ‘The warning ­was for “sexual scenes”. That goes without saying, the first season was about a couple who move in next to swingers’
news.summary: Trigger warnings are getting sillier by the day. The first episode of the new series of  The Couple Next Door  (Channel 4, Monday, 9pm) came with a caution: “Contains strong language and scenes of surgery.”

news.title: Hollywood’s most toxic divorce just got even nastier – how Ioan Gruffudd and Alice Evans’ children were dragged into bitter split
news.summary: By their very nature, Hollywood divorces are high-stakes, messy, bitter and rarely straightforward.
